text: I will give them a sign, and I will send some who survive to the nations. They will go to Tarshish, to the Libyans and Lydians66:19. “Libyans and Lydians”: literally “Pul and Lud.” (who are famous as archers), to Tubal and Greece, and to the distant lands that haven't heard about me or seen my glory. They will announce my glory among the nations.
